generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings and vehicles driving on it, indicating it is a road.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and architectural features are visible along the street, which are buildings.
- wall: A portion of a building's exterior wall is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Green traffic lights are visible hanging over the road.
- traffic sign: A green street sign is visible on a pole, indicating a street name.
- vegetation: Bare tree branches are visible on the right side of the image, indicating vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a twilight sky with some clouds.
- car: Multiple cars and SUVs are visible on the road, including a yellow taxi on the left and a dark SUV on the right.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
